attributes.action: I would like healthcare staff to have a decent pay.
attributes.additional_details: Covid has been difficult on all, but it is an insult to healthcare staff that they are paid so little in comparison to other "essential workers". A better wage will also entice others to work and train within the NHS, as well as help retain others currently working in it.
attributes.background: Upon researching pay, truck drivers, brickies and other employment areas have much better pay than healthcare staff. A newly qualified nurse currently is paid less than 20k after tax, a driver earns 30k+

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Support NHS staff with a pay rise this year of 3% or more: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578071

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373

Automatic Yearly Pay Rise For NHS Health Care Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565256

Raise NHS Staff pay by a minimum 5% for £18-25k, 4% for 25k-35k: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578035
